name: Vileplume
flavorText:
It has the world’s largest petals. With every step,
the petals shake out heavy clouds of toxic pollen.

previous.name: Gloom
previous.flavorText:
The fluid that
oozes from its
mouth isn't drool. It is a nectar
that is used to
attract prey.

next.name: Paras
next.flavorText:
Burrows to suck
tree roots. The
mushrooms on its back grow by draw­
ing nutrients from
the bug host.

pokemon.name: Oddish
pokemon.flavorText:
During the day,
it keeps its face
buried in the ground. At night,
it wanders around
sowing its seeds.

pokemon.name: Gloom
pokemon.flavorText:
The fluid that
oozes from its
mouth isn't drool. It is a nectar
that is used to
attract prey.

pokemon.name: Vileplume
pokemon.flavorText:
It has the world’s largest petals. With every step,
the petals shake out heavy clouds of toxic pollen.

pokemon.name: Bellossom
pokemon.flavorText:
Plentiful in the tropics. When it
dances, its petals rub together and
make a pleasant ringing sound.
